name: Alice HOY v. SOUTHEASTERN PENNSYLVANIA TRANSPORTATION AUTHORITY, Appellant
name_abbreviation: Hoy v. Southeastern Pennsylvania Transportation Authority

judges: Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, ZAPPALA, PAPADAKOS and CAPPY, JJ.
McDERMOTT, J., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
NIX, C.J., and FLAHERTY, J., dissent.
parties: Alice HOY v. SOUTHEASTERN PENNSYLVANIA TRANSPORTATION AUTHORITY, Appellant.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Order affirmed.
McDERMOTT, J., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
NIX, C.J., and FLAHERTY, J., dissent.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Felix P. Gonzalez, Gen. Counsel, SEPTA, Thomas A. Leonard, Paul S. Diamond, Thomas J. Foley, III, John N. Ellison, Philadelphia, for appellant.
Richard J. Mennies, West Conshohockn, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
585 A.2d 464
Alice HOY v. SOUTHEASTERN PENNSYLVANIA TRANSPORTATION AUTHORITY, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Jan. 17, 1991.
Decided Feb. 6, 1991.
Felix P. Gonzalez, Gen. Counsel, SEPTA, Thomas A. Leonard, Paul S. Diamond, Thomas J. Foley, III, John N. Ellison, Philadelphia, for appellant.
Richard J. Mennies, West Conshohockn, for appellee.
Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, ZAPPALA, PAPADAKOS and CAPPY, JJ.
